channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree has split and is actively moving apart, 4th July
item.description:
`Behind the properties at 15 / 16 / 17 Stearman Walk, Lobleys Drive the tree has split apart, and is actively moving in opposite directions with wind. We believe its quite unsafe and can possibly fall damaging property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beamont Walk, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very old tree, could easily fall onto my car and house, 4th July
item.description:
The tree between no. 2 and no. 4 Overbrook Drive, Cheltenham, GL52 3HR is very old and could easily fall onto my car and house. Please investigate, remove and replace with a new tree. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Overbrook Drive, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No access to Gloucestershire way path at Greenfield Farm, 4th July
item.description:
The path through Greenfield Farm has been blocked by placing “Private Land no trespassing” on all access areas on all sides of the farm. The gates are chained and locked with padlocks. There appears to be no way around these obstacles. A local resident informed us that this has been blocked for many months. The Gloucestershire Way signs are clearly directing you through the farm. Therefore the Gloucestershire Way is not accessible at this location.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenway Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees require maintenance, 4th July
item.description:
Right hand side of Laxton road trees and foliage have not been maintained for many years.These branches are in need of cutting back at a high level due to trees being severely overgrown and encroaching into the parking area. Trees have grown extremely tall and branches are now also touching end property (number 28) causing damage to guttering. Falling branches along tree line also pose risk to parked cars. These trees are located on the border between the Green lane footpath and Laxton road residential parking, and require maintenance all the way around from the beginning of parking area to the surrounding footpath to Green lane. These trees border the public right of way footpath around the back of Laxton Road to Green lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 4th July
item.description:
Email received 04/07/2025 - copy attached. Customer reports: The wind has blown parts of the tree down onto my vehicle. We like the tree but feel it has grown taller than it's meant to and will become a danger.... When do they get 'trimmed"? Am I allowed to take a saw to it?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 4th July
item.description:
28 day with 2 way stop and go please lift and reset gully 800x700x60mm stats required (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Getting to high getting wasp/bees around children, 4th July
item.description:
GL32EZ Sandfield Road. Grass is the highest now we have ever seen it and never was like this when it was with Tewksbury council. Last time this happened but lower Tewksbury said that this was almost to high to cut and had to get other machines in which if they looked at it now it’s far to high for them. Trouble is it’s attracting lots of wasp and things and many children walk along this path and we have a disabled child which walks to car each day pass this. This is the second email now that has been sent bout this and not heard anything. Could we please have someone contact us regarding this please as your map and dates is still dated 2024 so this shows how useless things is. If not we will once again take this further. There is two drains under this lot so we will not be breaking our mowers to do this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandfield Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 4th July
item.description:
2hr make safe with give and take please place x1 keep right arrow sign plus x2 sandbags plus x1 cone over broken gully (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stop lines have not been replaced, 4th July
item.description:
Bedford Avenue and Cornwall Avenue The stop lines have not been replaced after the resurfacing of the road and the new lines have been put down. Road users come flying out of Cornwall Avenue because they think they have right of way on to Bedford Avenue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Cornwall Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
